meanings.sent1: The room looked cluttered with all the overdecorations.
meanings.sent2: She removed the overdecorations from the walls to create a more minimalist look.
meanings.sent3: The overdecorations on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was a walking display of overdecorations.
meanings.sent5: The overdecorations in the garden attracted butterflies and birds.

meanings.sent1: Please don't overdecorate the Christmas tree with too many ornaments.
meanings.sent2: They overdecorated the venue for the party, making it look extravagant.
meanings.sent3: He tends to overdecorate his essays with unnecessary details.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was overdecorating her room with all the posters.
meanings.sent5: The chef tends to overdecorate his dishes with elaborate garnishes.
